mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plan (userNum, scheduleNum, placeNum) VALUES (#{userNum}, #{scheduleNum}, #{placeNum})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM plan WHERE userNum = #{userNum} AND scheduleNum = #{scheduleNum} AND placeNum = #{placeNum}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM plan WHERE userNum = #{userNum} AND scheduleNum = #{scheduleNum} AND placeNum = #{placeNum}
SELECT p.* FROM plan pl JOIN place p ON pl.placeNum = p.placeNum WHERE pl.userNum = #{userNum} AND pl.scheduleNum = #{scheduleNum}
